name: OptionMarketSafeSlippage
description: OptionMarketSafeSlippage. Allows users to set the min/max price they want to purchase options for, to help prevent frontrunning or sandwich attacks.

eventDecorators.name: PositionClosedWithSlippageControls
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Position is closed.

eventDecorators.name: PositionOpenedWithSlippageControls
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Position is opened.

functionDecorators.name: closePosition
functionDecorators.description: Attempts to close some amount of an open position within bounds, reverts if the returned amount is outside of the accepted bounds.

parameterDecorators.name: _listingId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the relevant OptionListing.

parameterDecorators.name: tradeType
parameterDecorators.description: Is the trade a long/short & call/put?.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount the user has requested to close.

parameterDecorators.name: minCost
parameterDecorators.description: Min amount for the cost of the trade.

parameterDecorators.name: maxCost
parameterDecorators.description: Max amount for the cost of the trade.

functionDecorators.name: openPosition
functionDecorators.description: Attempts to open positions within bounds, reverts if the returned amount is outside of the accepted bounds.

parameterDecorators.name: _listingId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the relevant OptionListing.

parameterDecorators.name: tradeType
parameterDecorators.description: Is the trade a long/short & call/put?.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount the user has requested to trade.

parameterDecorators.name: minCost
parameterDecorators.description: Min cost user is willing to pay.

parameterDecorators.name: maxCost
parameterDecorators.description: Max cost user is willing to pay.
